title: Koduthathellaam Koduthaan Song Lyrics Padagotti
stanzas:
Koduthathellaam koduthaan
avan yaarukkaaga koduthaan
orutharukkaa koduthaan?
illai, oorukkaaga koduthaan.(2)

Mankudisai vaasal endraal
thendral vara veruthidumaa(2)
maalai nilaa yaezhai endraal
velicham thara maruthidumaa

Koduthathellaam koduthaan
avan yaarukkaaga koduthaan
orutharukkaa koduthaan?
illai, oorukkaaga koduthaan

padaithavan mael
pazhiyum illai
pasithavan mel
paavam illai.
kidaitharvagal pirithukondaar
uzhaithavargal theruvil nindraar

palar vaada vaada
silar vazha vazha
orupodhum dheivam
koduthathillai.

Koduthathellaam koduthaan
avan yaarukkaaga koduthaan
orutharukkaa koduthaan?
illai, oorukkaaga koduthaan

madi niraya porul irukkum
manam neraya irul irukkum
edhuvantha podhum
podhuvendru vaithu
vazhkindra perai
vazhthiduvom

Koduthathellaam koduthaan
avan yaarukkaaga koduthaan
orutharukkaa koduthaan?
illai, oorukkaaga koduthaan
